attributes.action: Keep Gas Guzzler Green Tax and GIVE THE MONEY BACK AS GRANT for LPG conversion for all 2.0 ltr and above cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goverment want's to be seen as the green party with the Tax on big engined cars...
Well keep the Tax and use the money to give all big car users access to a large grant to convert there engines to run on LPG gas.
LPG gas is 56 pence a litre so goverment saves face and we all can afford to run our bigger cars.
For example at the moment it would cost £1700 to convert our 2L beetle.
How can we afford this -£500 to £600 would be a realistic price.
